timeline.headline: Christian Pérez Biography in timeline version
timeline.text: You will see a short biography in timeline style about me.

asset.caption: Cartoon of a famous singer pitbull

date.headline: A couple in love
date.text:
A beautiful couple brought their first child at Christmas and in the best year

That year was also born Winona Ryder and Mariah Carey.

This year Intel releases world's first microprocessor, the famous 4004.

Apollo 15 astronauts become the first to ride in a lunar rover a day after landing on the surface.

asset.caption: Vector - Beautiful couple in love with hearts cartoon vector illustration graphic design

date.headline: Illustrate your Timeline with photos, videos, tweets and more.
date.text: Timeline can automatically pull in photos, videos from YouTube or Vimeo, tweets, wikipedia entries, and many other media types to help tell your story.

asset.caption: Screenshot from TimelineJS Embed Generator tool (see below)

date.headline: Blockquote
date.text:
This is an example of a blockquote.
<blockquote>“Just use html blockquotes in the media field.”</blockquote>

asset.media: “You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose. You're on your own, and you know what you know. And you are the guy who'll decide where to go.”

date.headline: Google Map
date.text: Google Maps are easy too. Just add the link to the map in the media field.

date.headline: Flickr
date.text: To add a Flickr photo, just paste a link to the photo page in the media field. Example: http://www.flickr.com/photos/zachwise/7074630607/

date.headline: A Tweet
date.text: To add a tweet, just paste a link to the tweet stats in the media field. Example: http://twitter.com/alykat/status/164184609519697920

date.headline: Vimeo
date.text: Just add a link to the video in the media field. Example: https://vimeo.com/33211636

date.headline: SoundCloud
date.text: Just add a link to the track in the media field.

date.headline: Get started!
date.text: Use the generator form to make your first timeline now.
